question: [Calm] Deutsch: Bestimme the slope of the noisy line der dargestellten Gerade.

qas.question: [Calm] Deutsch: Bestimme the slope of the noisy line der dargestellten Gerade.
[Brief] Portugues: Indique the intercept of the noisy line da linha representada.
[Study] Norsk: Oppgi the value of y when x equals 1 for linjen som vises.
